values.summary:

- Working in the college gave me a lot of advantages in learning English.

values.summary:
- Worked under pressure as a project manager in one of the biggest city in USA. 
- Often met local customers in order to get requirements, then planed the project, communicated with Vietnamese developers, managed the project, and tested. 
- Experienced in many languages (.NET, Java…) and software (CodeSmith, Blackberry, MS Project…).

values.summary:

- Created, managed, and controlled many mini-websites for mobile devices. PHP is the major language. Experienced in e-Commerce system.
- Co-operated HR application which helps local offices to manage Human Resource Processes.
